name: Perdition (itch) (Fernofai)
description:
Perdition is a game I made for university. The initial idea was to make a Doom clone - at very small scale of course.

It's a maximum of 5 minute FPS experience. Have fun and feel free to leave feedback.

Controls

  • WASD to run
  • LMB to shoot
  • Space to interact with buttons and computers
  • F to toggle flashlight

I used some assets which where created by other people:

  • Font (https://www.dafont.com/doom.font)
  • Environment Textures (https://omegagrim.itch.io/retro-fps-textures)
  • Skybox (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/starfield-skybox...)
  • Lava Shader (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/lava-flowing-shader-33635)
  • Fireball (https://spritedatabase.net/file/552)
  • Pain Elemental (https://spritedatabase.net/file/563)
